item.title: My First Post
item.description: This article is to test out the syntax highlighting for DAX code using Prism. It also is to test out using tags and categories.

item.title: Defining Measures in DAX Studio
item.description: After a period of not defining measures in DAX Studio, I seem to make the same two mistakes. The first error occurs when I try to run the following code to define a measure in a query: DEFINE MEASURE [UnitPrice] = SUM('Sales'[Unit Price]) EVALUATE CALCULATE([UnitPrice]) This generates the following error: The syntax for ‘=’ is incorrect. . The issue lies in not including the table name before the measure name.
